location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Correspondence and other Papers concerning Lewis Pelly's Application to join the Bombay Staff Corps

physicalDescription.extent: The contents of the file have been arranged chronologically.
The file has been foliated with a pencil number enclosed in a circle in the top right corner of each folio.

mods.abstract: Lewis Pelly's application in 1861 to join the Bombay Staff Corps including correspondence with the Adjutant General of the Army, Bombay regarding the application; supporting correspondence and testimonies from 1857 to 1859 and the confirmation letter 31 July 1861 of the submission of Pelly's name to Government to be entered into the Staff Corps with the rank of Major.
